## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have checked for and removed any debugging code or console logs

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested the changes in Cypress UI mode
- [ ] All feature files run successfully

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have updated CONTRIBUTING.md if workflow changed
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions
- [ ] I have updated or added Gherkin feature descriptions if applicable

### Commits

- [ ] My commits are signed off (using `git commit -s` or GitHub UI signoff)
- [ ] My commit messages follow the conventional commit format
- [ ] I have rebased my branch on the latest main branch

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not added new dependencies (or have justified why they are necessary)
- [ ] If dependencies were added, I ran `npm audit` to check for vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have updated package.json and package-lock.json if needed

### Branch Protection

- [ ] I understand that all changes must go through PR review process
- [ ] I have requested review from code owners
- [ ] I am aware that CI checks must pass before merging

## CI Status

<!-- CI checks will run automatically. Ensure they pass before requesting review. -->

- [ ] All CI checks are passing
- [ ] CodeQL analysis passed without new alerts
- [ ] No merge conflicts with main branch
